name: Fight Hunger Foundation

address: F-201, Sai Prasad Building, Sion Kamgar CHS Ltd
29th Road, Bhandar wada, Above Atharva Hospital, Sion (E)

briefDescription: Fight Hunger Foundation is an Indian not-for-profit organization that is dedicated to treating children with severe acute malnutrition, a life threatening form of hunger. In India, 6 million children suffer from acute malnutrition and they are 9 times more likely to die before the age of five, compared to a normal child. We detect, treat and prevent acute malnutrition in children so they can regain their health and fulfil their potential.Our approach is to identify and correctly diagnose the most affected children, and treat them by referring them to local health centers.
